original_text: So the Lord became angry with Judah and Jerusalem. He made them disgusting places which other people insult. You can see this with your own eyes.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다와 예루살렘에 진노하시고 내버리사 두려움과 놀람과 비웃음거리가 되게 하신 것을 너희가 똑똑히 보는 바라

sentences.original_text: So the Lord became angry with Judah and Jerusalem
You can see this with your own eyes
